items.content_html: This portfolio website is built using Once UI, a lightweight and versatile design system that simplifies the creation of consistent and customizable applications. It provides a robust token and style system, along with a library of reusable components, making it easy to build modern, responsive websites in Next.js

It provides a robust token and style system, along with a library of reusable components, making it easy to build modern, responsive websites in Next.js

items.content_html: A lightweight CigalPay Crypto Card, CDN-hosted HTML, CSS, and JavaScript library designed for easy integration of cryptocurrency selection cards into payment interfaces. It allows users to choose from various cryptocurrencies in a visually appealing and user-friendly way

It allows users to choose from various cryptocurrencies in a visually appealing and user-friendly way

items.content_html: Interactive Terminal Portfolio An interactive, terminal-style portfolio designed for showcasing experience and skills tailored for DevOps and SRE roles. This project replicates a lightweight Linux terminal interface, allowing recruiters to engage with your resume dynamically using real terminal-like commands.

This project replicates a lightweight Linux terminal interface, allowing recruiters to engage with your resume dynamically using real terminal-like commands.

items.content_html: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly
